subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy, who just lost his No. 1 ranking to Tiger Woods, decided after his abrupt withdrawal from the Honda Classic earlier this month to return to the roots of why he plays.
snippet: Rory McIlroy, who just lost his No. 1 ranking to Tiger Woods, decided after his abrupt withdrawal from the Honda Classic earlier this month to return to the roots of why he plays.
